chapters.title: All in a Nutshell
chapters.description: Donald has a walnut-shaped shop where he makes nut butters.

chapters.title: Bee at The Beach
chapters.description: Donald is enjoying a day at the beach.

chapters.title: Corn Chips
chapters.description: Donald is shoveling the snow off his walk; Chip 'n' Dale are shoveling their branch.

chapters.title: Donald's Happy Birthday
chapters.description: A birthday present of cigars goes awry.

chapters.title: Dude Duck
chapters.description: Donald is vacationing at a dude ranch.

chapters.title: Hook, Lion and Sinker
chapters.description: Louie the Mountain Lion and his son attempt to steal from Donald.

chapters.title: Lion Around
chapters.description: Donald's nephews use a mountain lion costume to scare Donald.

chapters.title: Out on a Limb
chapters.description: Donald is pruning Chip 'n' Dale's tree home.

chapters.title: Slide Donald Slide
chapters.description: Donald wants to listen to the World Series on the radio.

chapters.title: Test Pilot Donald
chapters.description: Dale dreams of flying and finds a perfect opportunity.

chapters.title: The Greener Yard
chapters.description: A small beetle decides that the grass is greener in the yard next door.

chapters.title: Toy Tinkers
chapters.description: Chip and Dale sneak into Donald Duck's house to steal his walnuts.

chapters.title: Winter Storage
chapters.description: Chip and Dale are worried about gathering enough acorns for the winter.
